txt.en: You have discovered the Uzbad-bakân kitchens
You have discovered the Uzbad-bakân Orc-housing
You have discovered the Uzbad-bakân forge
Búi has tasked you with exploring the expansive Orc-city of Uzbad-bakân.
You have discovered the Uzbad-bakân armoury
Uzbad-bakân is a vast camp full of Orcs. You should explore each of its facets.
Uzbad-bakân can be found south of the Hall of Flowing Water.\n\nYou should head south through Zelem-melek and explore Uzbad-bakân, the stronghold of the Orcs in Zelem-melek.

'I do not like the sound of your tale, [placeholder]. There are too many Orcs for my liking in Zelem-melek, and it would only make sense that there is some great stronghold from which they pour.

'I will continue to make my way cautiously through, and jot notes for my maps. Perhaps you wish to explore the Orc-encampment; I will gladly stay far from it.

'Good luck to you, friend!'

Foreman Mögr can be found in the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou have explored the massive Orc-encampment of Uzbad-bakân, and found their foothold to be very strong. You should convey this information to Mögr at once.

'Orcs everywhere! This is terrible, [placeholder].\n\n'I do not like the state of the south pass in Zelem-melek. The Orc-watch post has been established near there. If you fortify that outpost, I believe we will be less oppressed here.'
Tell Foreman Mögr of the presence of many Orcs in Zelem-melek
